price: Arza ve üzerindekilere elbet biz mirasçı oluruz ve yalnız bize döndürülürler.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
